title: Communication Design for Computer-Assisted Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A course for in-service secondary mathematics teachers focusing on acquiring effective instructional communication strategies in VR/simulation environments, supporting personalized learning experiences in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more communication techniques to promote cognitive processes in VR-based simulations
Learners design strategies to improve learner-instructor interaction efficiency by over 20% in computer-based environments
Participants diagnose learners' conceptual understanding using a three-tier evaluation system with real-time feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
